alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:34PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Walton, southwestern Holmes and central Washington Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Bonifay to 6 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Whitehead Crossroads, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Bunker, Johnson Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay and Douglass Crossroad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; South Walton; Washington
